list.name: commits
list.query: SELECT * FROM events WHERE event = 'UI_COMMIT_COMPLETED' AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_octets"), 1s)*8 AS "IN", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_octets"), 1s) AS "OUT" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.egress_stats.if_octets"), 1s) *8 FROM "juniperNetworks.jnprLogicalInterfaceExt" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_info.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_info.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.ingress_stats.if_octets"), 10s) *8 FROM "juniperNetworks.jnprLogicalInterfaceExt" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_info.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_info.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_octets"), 2s) AS "AGR IN" , non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_octets"), 2s) AS "AGR OUT"  FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.parent_ae_name"=~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.parent_ae_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.ingress_stats.if_octets"), 2s)  AS "subAGR IN" , non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.egress_stats.if_octets"), 2s) AS "subAGR OUT"  FROM "juniperNetworks.jnprLogicalInterfaceExt" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_info.parent_ae_name"=~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_info.parent_ae_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_pkts"), 1s) AS "IN", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_pkts"), 1s) AS "OUT" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.ingress_stats.if_packets"), 1s) AS "sub-IN",  non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.egress_stats.if_packets") , 1s)AS "sub-OUT" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnprLogicalInterfaceExt" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_info.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_info.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_pkts"), 2s) AS "AGR IN" , non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_pkts"), 2s) AS "AGR OUT"  FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.parent_ae_name"=~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.parent_ae_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.ingress_stats.if_packets"), 2s) AS "subAGR IN" , non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.egress_stats.if_packets"), 2s) AS "subAGR OUT"  FROM "juniperNetworks.jnprLogicalInterfaceExt" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_info.parent_ae_name"=~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_info.parent_ae_name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("interface_stats.egress_errors.if_errors") AS "egress-if-errors", mean("interface_stats.egress_errors.if_discards") AS "egress-if-discard", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_errors") AS "ingress-if-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_discards") AS "egress-if-discard", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_fifo_errors") AS "ingress-fifo-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_frame_errors") AS "ingress-frame-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l2_mismatch_timeouts") AS "ingress-l2-mismatch-timeout", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l2chan_errors") AS "ingress-l2-chan-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l3_incompletes") AS "ingress-l3-incomplete", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_qdrops") AS "ingress-qdrops", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_resource_errors") AS "ingress-resource-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_runts") AS "ingress-runt" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("interface_stats.egress_errors.if_errors") AS "egress-if-errors", mean("interface_stats.egress_errors.if_discards") AS "egress-if-discard", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_errors") AS "ingress-if-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_discards") AS "egress-if-discard", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_fifo_errors") AS "ingress-fifo-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_frame_errors") AS "ingress-frame-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l2_mismatch_timeouts") AS "ingress-l2-mismatch-timeout", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l2chan_errors") AS "ingress-l2-chan-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l3_incompletes") AS "ingress-l3-incomplete", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_qdrops") AS "ingress-qdrops", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_resource_errors") AS "ingress-resource-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_runts") AS "ingress-runt" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.parent_ae_name" =~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_uc_pkts"), 1s) AS "out-unicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_mc_pkts"), 1s) AS "out-multicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_bc_pkts"), 1s) AS "out-broadcast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_uc_pkts"), 1s) AS "in-unicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_mc_pkts"), 1s) AS "in-multicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_bc_pkts"), 1s) AS "in-broadcast" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.egress_stats.if_ucast_packets"), 1s) AS "out-unicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.egress_stats.if_mcast_packets"), 1s) AS "out-multicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.ingress_stats.if_ucast_packets"), 1s) AS "in-unicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.ingress_stats.if_mcast_packets"), 1s) AS "in-multicast" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnprLogicalInterfaceExt" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_info.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_info.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_uc_pkts"), 2s) AS "agr-out-unicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_mc_pkts"), 2s) AS "agr-out-multicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_bc_pkts"), 2s) AS "agr-out-broadcast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_uc_pkts"), 2s) AS "agr-in-unicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_mc_pkts"), 2s) AS "agr-in-multicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_bc_pkts"), 2s) AS "agr-in-broadcast" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.parent_ae_name" =~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.parent_ae_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.egress_stats.if_ucast_packets"), 2s) AS "sub-agr-out-unicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.egress_stats.if_mcast_packets"), 2s) AS "sub-agr-out-multicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.ingress_stats.if_ucast_packets"), 2s) AS "sub-agr-in-unicast", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_info.ingress_stats.if_mcast_packets"), 2s) AS "sub-agr-in-multicast" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnprLogicalInterfaceExt" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_info.parent_ae_name" =~ /^$if_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_info.parent_ae_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_queue_info.bytes"), 1s) FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_queue_info.bytes"), 1s) FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.parent_ae_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.parent_ae_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_queue_info.packets"), 1s) FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_queue_info.packets"), 1s) FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.parent_ae_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($group_by), "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.parent_ae_name" fill(null)

SELECT "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.avg_buffer_occupancy" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name"

SELECT "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.cur_buffer_occupancy" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name"

SELECT "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.peak_buffer_occupancy" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name"

list.name: ifAlias
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "telegrafsnmp" WITH KEY = "aka" WHERE "hostname" =~ /^$host_regex/

list.name: if_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "telegrafsnmp" WITH KEY IN ("ifDescr") WHERE "aka" =~ /^$ifAlias/ AND "hostname"=~ /^$host_regex/

list.name: queue
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WITH KEY = "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" WHERE "device" =~ /$host_regex/

list.name: if_nameOLD
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WITH KEY = "interface_stats.if_name" WHERE "device" =~ /$host_regex/

title: JTI - Interface statistics (PHY + L3 + noAGR Henrik)
